body_html: I meet stuck problem on 1080ti today twice, first time I got warning says tensorflow/core/common_runtime/bfc_allocator.cc:217] Allocator (GPU_2_bfc) ran out of memory trying to allocate 2.29GiB. The call, this time I got nothing, I see cpu and memory are still being used but gpu utility is 0%, this tf benchmarks program has run 3 hours...

body: I meet stuck problem on 1080ti today twice, first time I got warning says `tensorflow/core/common_runtime/bfc_allocator.cc:217] Allocator (GPU_2_bfc) ran out of memory trying to allocate 2.29GiB. The call`, this time I got nothing, I see cpu and memory are still being used but gpu utility is 0%, this tf benchmarks program has run 3 hours...
